languages.text: {n}Старуха недовольно шипит:{/n} "Вдвоем на меня насели, значит? Были б вы такие смелые против блюстителей! Но я умолкаю. Умолкаю, да. Одна против двух глав клановых не пойду. Хотите мириться с блюстителями — миритесь".

{n}The old woman hisses in dissatisfaction.{/n} "You two are ganging up on me, is that it? So brave you are against an old woman! But I'll shut up. I will, indeed. I won't go against two clan leaders on my own. If you want to make peace with the enforcers — make your peace."
languages.original_text: {n}Старуха недовольно шипит:{/n} "Вдвоем на меня насели, значит? Были б вы такие смелые против блюстителей! Но я умолкаю. Умолкаю, да. Одна против двух глав клановых не пойду. Хотите мириться с блюстителями — миритесь".

traits.locale_text: {n}The old woman hisses in dissatisfaction.{/n} "You two are ganging up on me, is that it? So brave you are against an old woman! But I'll shut up. I will, indeed. I won't go against two clan leaders on my own. If you want to make peace with the guards — make your peace."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

traits.locale_text: {n}The old woman hisses in dissatisfaction.{/n} "You two are ganging up on me, is that it? So brave you are against an old woman! But I'll shut up. I will, indeed. I won't go against two clan leaders on my own. If you want to make peace with the guards — make your peace."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

traits.locale_text: {n}The old woman hisses in dissatisfaction.{/n} "You two are ganging up on me, is that it? So brave you are against an old woman! But I'll shut up. I will, indeed. I won't go against two clan leaders on my own. If you want to make peace with the enforcers — make your peace."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: {n}老妇人不满地嘶吼着。{/n}“你们两个联合起来对付我了，是吗？你们这么对付一个老太太，可真有本事啊！不过我会闭嘴的。我闭嘴，我真闭嘴。我可不打算一个人惹火两位氏族领袖。如果你们打算与执法者讲和，那就这样吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman hisses in dissatisfaction.{/n} "You two are ganging up on me, is that it? So brave you are against an old woman! But I'll shut up. I will, indeed. I won't go against two clan leaders on my own. If you want to make peace with the enforcers — make your peace."

traits.locale_text: {n}老妇人不满地嘶吼着。{/n}“你们两个联合起来对付我了，是吗？你们这么对付一个老太太，可真有本事啊！不过我会闭嘴的。我闭嘴，我真闭嘴。我可不打算一个人惹火两位氏族领袖。如果你们打算与镇压者讲和，那就这样吧。”
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: {n}La anciana sisea, frustrada.{/n} «¿Ahora vais los dos contra mí? ¡Muy valiente eso de uniros contra una abuela! Pero me voy a callar. Sí, de verdad. No voy a enfrentarme a dos líderes de clanes yo sola. Si queréis buscar la paz con los guardias, adelante, probad».
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman hisses in dissatisfaction.{/n} "You two are ganging up on me, is that it? So brave you are against an old woman! But I'll shut up. I will, indeed. I won't go against two clan leaders on my own. If you want to make peace with the enforcers — make your peace."

traits.locale_text: {n}La anciana sisea, frustrada.{/n} «¿Ahora vais los dos contra mí? ¡Muy valiente eso de uniros contra una abuela! Pero me voy a callar. Sí, de verdad. No voy a enfrentarme a dos líderes de clanes yo sola. Si queréis buscar la paz con los guardias, adelante, probad».
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: {n}老女は不満そうに声を荒げる。{/n}「あんたら2人は、アタシを恨んでいるんだろう、ええ？年老いた女性に立ち向かうなんて、勇ましいもんだね！だが、ああ、黙るよ。黙ってやろうじゃないの。1人で2人のリーダーには逆らえないからね。エンフォーサーと和平を結びたいのなら、すきにするがいいさ」
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman hisses in dissatisfaction.{/n} "You two are ganging up on me, is that it? So brave you are against an old woman! But I'll shut up. I will, indeed. I won't go against two clan leaders on my own. If you want to make peace with the enforcers — make your peace."

traits.locale_text: {n}老女は不満そうに声を荒げる。{/n}「あんたら2人は、アタシを恨んでいるんだろう、ええ？年老いた女性に立ち向かうなんて、勇ましいもんだね！だが、ああ、黙るよ。黙ってやろうじゃないの。1人で2人のリーダーには逆らえないからね。エンフォーサーと和平を結びたいのなら、すきにするがいいさ」
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: {n}Die alte Frau zischt verärgert.{/n} "Ihr zwei verschwört Euch also jetzt gegen mich, ja? Wie mutig Ihr doch seid, gegen eine alte Frau! Aber ich bin schon still. Oh ja, ich bin still. Ich stelle mich nicht alleine gegen zwei Clan-Anführer. Wenn Ihr Frieden mit den Enforcers schließen wollt, schließt Frieden."
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman hisses in dissatisfaction.{/n} "You two are ganging up on me, is that it? So brave you are against an old woman! But I'll shut up. I will, indeed. I won't go against two clan leaders on my own. If you want to make peace with the enforcers — make your peace."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die alte Frau zischt verärgert.{/n} "Ihr zwei verschwört Euch also jetzt gegen mich, ja? Wie mutig Ihr doch seid, gegen eine alte Frau! Aber ich bin schon still. Oh ja, ich bin still. Ich stelle mich nicht alleine gegen zwei Clan-Anfüher. Wenn Ihr Frieden mit den Enforcers schließen wollt, schließt Frieden."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: {n}La doyenne contrariée reprend la parole d'un ton amer.{/n} « Vous avez décidé de vous liguer contre moi, c'est ça ? Jouer les cadors face à une pauvre vieille sans défense... il n'y a franchement pas de quoi être fier ! Mais puisque vous insistez, je ne dirai plus rien. Je ne suis pas assez bête pour m'opposer à deux chefs de clan à moi toute seule. Si vous voulez faire la paix avec les prévôts, je ne vous en empêcherai pas. »
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman hisses in dissatisfaction.{/n} "You two are ganging up on me, is that it? So brave you are against an old woman! But I'll shut up. I will, indeed. I won't go against two clan leaders on my own. If you want to make peace with the enforcers — make your peace."

traits.locale_text: {n}La doyenne contrariée reprend la parole d'un ton amer.{/n} « Vous avez décidé de vous liguer contre moi, c'est ça ? Jouer les cadors face à une pauvre vieille sans défense... il n'y a franchement pas de quoi être fier ! Mais puisque vous insistez, je ne dirai plus rien. Je ne suis pas assez bête pour m'opposer à deux chefs de clan à moi toute seule. Si vous voulez faire la paix avec les prévôts, je ne vous en empêcherai pas. »
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: {n}Yaşlı kadın, memnuniyetsizce tıslıyor.{/n} "İkiniz bir, ben tek ha? Yaşlı bir kadına karşı ne de cesursunuz! Neyse, ben susacağım. Ya, öyle. Bir başıma iki klan liderine baş kaldıracak değilim. İnfazcılarla ara bulacaksanız size engel olmam."
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman hisses in dissatisfaction.{/n} "You two are ganging up on me, is that it? So brave you are against an old woman! But I'll shut up. I will, indeed. I won't go against two clan leaders on my own. If you want to make peace with the enforcers — make your peace."
